entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
